params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" OPR_RSLT_TYP, " +" ITEM_CD, " +" ITEM_NAME, " +" WS_CD, " +" WS_NAME, " +" PLANT_CD, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE) WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(OPR_INST_START_DATE) OPR_INST_START_DATE, " +" NVL(OPR_INST_QTY, 0), " +" NVL(IDENT_CARD_QTY, 0), " +" NVL(PKG_UNIT_QTY, 0), " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" STOCK_UNIT, " +" PRINT_QTY " +"FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" 1 OPR_RSLT_TYP, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.ITEM_CD ITEM_CD, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME, " +" NULL WS_CD, " +" NULL WS_NAME, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.PLANT_CD) PLANT_CD, " +" NULL WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" NULL OPR_INST_START_DATE, " +" SUM(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.OPR_INST_QTY) OPR_INST_QTY, " +" SUM(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.IDENT_CARD_QTY) IDENT_CARD_QTY, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.PKG_UNIT_QTY) PKG_UNIT_QTY, " +" NULL OPR_INST_CD, " +" NULL JOB_ODR_CD, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.STOCK_UNIT) STOCK_UNIT, " +" SUM(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.PRINT_QTY) PRINT_QTY " +" FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_CD, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_QTY) AS OPR_INST_QTY, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD) AS PLANT_CD, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME) AS ITEM_NAME, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY) AS PKG_UNIT_QTY, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT) AS STOCK_UNIT, " +" SUM(T_IDENT_CARD.IDENT_CARD_QTY) AS IDENT_CARD_QTY, " +" CEIL((MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_QTY) - NVL(SUM(T_IDENT_CARD.IDENT_CARD_QTY), 0)) / MAX(M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY)) AS PRINT_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_IDENT_CARD " +" WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_RSLT_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_STS_TYP = 2 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD = T_IDENT_CARD.OPR_INST_CD(+) " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.DEL_FLG(+) = 0 " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.OUTPUT_FLG(+) = 1 " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD " +" )T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM_ALL.ITEM_CD " +" UNION " +" SELECT " +" 2 OPR_RSLT_TYP, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.ITEM_CD) ITEM_CD, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD) WS_CD, " +" MAX(M_WS.WS_NAME) WS_NAME, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PLANT_CD) PLANT_CD, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE) WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_START_DATE) OPR_INST_START_DATE, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_QTY) OPR_INST_QTY, " +" SUM(T_IDENT_CARD.IDENT_CARD_QTY) IDENT_CARD_QTY, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY) PKG_UNIT_QTY, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD) OPR_INST_CD, " +" MAX(T_OD.JOB_ODR_CD) JOB_ODR_CD, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT) STOCK_UNIT, " +" NULL PRINT_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_IDENT_CARD, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WS, " +" T_OD " +" WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_WS.WS_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.OPR_INST_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.DEL_FLG(+) = 0 " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.OUTPUT_FLG(+) = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OUTSIDE_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = 2 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.FINAL_PROC_FLG = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" ) " +"WHERE " +" ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1 " +"ORDER BY " +" OPR_RSLT_TYP, " +" PLANT_CD, " +" WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" OPR_INST_CD"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_QTY, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PRINT_QTY, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_RSLT_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_STS_TYP = 2 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_QTY <> T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PRINT_QTY " +"ORDER BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_IDENT_CARD(IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO, OPR_INST_CD, PARTIAL_PRD_NO, RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ITEM_CD, JOB_ODR_CD, FIRST_IDENT_CARD_QTY, IDENT_CARD_QTY, OPR_DATE, PKG_UNIT_QTY, PLANT_CD, WS_CD, PRINT_QTY, PRINT_DATE, PRINT_FLG, CHANGE_FLG, DEL_FLG, OUTPUT_FLG) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, 0, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, TRUNC(SYSDATE), ?, ?, ?, null, null, 0, 0, 0, 1)"
"UPDATE " +" T_IDENT_CARD " +"SET " +" PRINT_QTY = ?, " +" PRINT_DATE = SYSDATE, " +" PRINT_FLG = 1 " +"WHERE " +" IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_RSLT_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_STS_TYP = 2 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +"ORDER BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE DESC"
